name: Airship Adventure
description:
Airship Adventure

You are an airship pilot that delivers supplies to different towns throughout the kingdom. Watch out, though! The airways aren't safe. You'll have to navigate your ship through waves of monsters and sky pirates trying to steal your precious cargo.

This is a short game made for Weekly Game Jam 161 with the theme of "pilot."

This game was made using RPG Maker MV.
